scripts.db:reset: npx sequelize-cli db:drop && npx sequelize-cli db:create && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.launch: npm run db:reset && npm run start
scripts.deps: npm i -D @babel/node @babel/preset-env @babel/preset-react babel-loader eslint eslint-config-airbnb eslint-config-prettier eslint-plugin-import eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y eslint-plugin-react eslint-plugin-react-hooks morgan sequelize-cli webpack webpack-cli && npm i express react react-dom cookie-parser dotenv jsonwebtoken pg pg-hstore react-dom sequelize
